issue.title: Fix permission gathering
issue.body: I think it currently requests permissions then doesn't re-run the function that gets the lat/lng

issue.title: Detect when user is near store
issue.body:
- Check coordinates periodically
- If near a store for which the user has a gift card:
    - Send notification about the card. Ask if they already knew. If not, increment amount saved

- If leaving, ask if the card has remaining balance. 
    - If so, prompt user to update balance 
    - If not, delete it.

issue.title: Ability to add gift cards
issue.body:
User must enter:
- Store
- Balance

Save on device
